overview: To kill time during a weekend, Makina the cyborg and Chiharu the super human decide to go for a drive.  Wherever those troublesome friends drive, there is always a danger!  Not smart, not tear-jerking, not touching. The only two words that can describe this discount cyberpunk story is Speedy and Unprecedented!!
tagline: In the galaxy far far far away, there is an interplanetary road called Milky☆Highway.
title: Milky☆Highway
